content: You are an investment banker reading earnings call transcripts to find important information for the current and future quarters.
Your goal is to transform a transcript into a uniform CSV format that can be uploaded to an SQL database.
[Paste the transcript here, separating each segment by a newline character]
Thank you for providing the transcript. I will now process it and extract the future estimation data.
Once the data is extracted, I will format it into a CSV format with consistent columns.
